content: Two patients in ‘NeoCure’ trial (PB-201) reported mild nausea, resolved spontaneously. No dose change.
metadata: Site: Hospital A, date: 2025-02-20, severity: mild

content: Single severe rash case from ‘Analge-Patch’ test batch (PB-203). Possibly related to adhesive. Patch removed.
metadata: Occurrence date: 2025-02-22, reported to safety board

content: One instance of injection device malfunction (DIA-01) with sensor error. No harm to volunteer.
metadata: Date: 2025-02-28, event code: M-Err, follow-up needed

content: During ‘Viraxin-B’ pilot usage, minor headache reported. Investigators uncertain if drug-related.
metadata: Date: 2025-02-18, site: R&D affiliate Europe, mild

content: No adverse events yet reported for ‘Ampiclox-XYZ’ scale-up. Ongoing vigilance for GI upset.
metadata: Current observation: 14 days post-dose, next check: 2025-03-15
